product_name: The North Face  Surge II Charged Daypack - Women's
long_description: The women's North Face Surge II Charged daypack has a built-in power supply and 1,648 cu. in. capacity so you can travel all day and overnight and keep your mobile devices charged.
short_description: The women's North Face Surge II Charged daypack has a built-in power supply and 1,648 cu. in. capacity so you can travel all day and overnight and keep your mobile devices charged.
